rules: Rule1: If the bank uses a credit scoring system, then the bank has access to customer data.
Rule2: Whenever the bank serves retail customers, the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Rule3: Under the condition that the bank provides business loans, the bank offers a mortgage product.
Rule4: If the bank secures asset backing, then the bank needs collateral.
Rule5: Either the bank expands its market share or the bank maintains existing clients.
Rule6: Whenever the bank maintains existing clients, the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Rule7: If the bank attracts new customers, then the bank achieves its profitability target.
Rule8: Under the condition that the bank invests in a digital platform, if the bank expands its market share, then the bank attracts new customers.
Rule9: If the bank partners with a fintech company, then whenever the bank expands its market share, the bank attracts new customers.
Rule10: Under the condition that the bank develops a mobile app, the bank invests in a digital platform.
Rule11: Provided that the bank integrates a third-party API, the bank partners with a fintech company.
Rule12: Under the condition that the bank hires software developers, the bank creates a user interface.
Rule13: Either the bank hires software developers or the bank outsources tech development.
Rule14: Provided that the bank outsources tech development, the bank integrates a third-party API.
Rule15: Whenever the bank allocates an R&D budget, if the bank hires software developers, then the bank develops a mobile app.
Rule16: If the bank operates physical branches, then the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Rule17: Either the bank reduces its branch network or the bank keeps a full branch network.
Rule18: If the bank keeps a full branch network, then the bank operates physical branches.
Rule19: Whenever the bank implements a hybrid model, the bank transitions to digital-only.
Rule20: If the bank receives regulatory approval, then either the bank faces regulatory hurdles or, under the condition that the bank reduces its branch network, the bank implements a hybrid model.
Rule21: Provided that the bank prevents a security incident, it is not the case that the bank suffers a data breach.
Rule22: Provided that the bank requires data protection, if the bank has access to customer data, then the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Rule23: If the bank automates back-office processes, then the bank improves operational efficiency.
Rule24: Either the bank automates back-office processes or the bank streamlines manual workflows.
Rule25: Under the condition that the bank streamlines manual workflows, if the bank exceeds its expense budget, then the bank does not miss its revenue target.
Rule26: Whenever the bank creates a user interface, the bank designs customer experience.
Rule27: Provided that the bank tests user feedback, the bank develops a mobile app.
Rule28: If the bank conducts a usability study, then whenever the bank designs customer experience, the bank tests user feedback.
Rule29: Either the bank conducts a usability study or the bank collects customer surveys.
Rule30: Under the condition that the bank collects customer surveys, if the bank designs customer experience, then the bank tests user feedback.
Rule31: Either the bank offers promotional rates or, if the bank expands its market share, then the bank attracts new customers.
Rule32: Either the bank maintains standard pricing or it is not the case that the bank offers promotional rates.
Rule33: If the bank conducts risk assessment, then provided that the bank complies with privacy regulations, the bank requires data protection.
Rule34: Whenever the bank captures a market opportunity, the bank does not maintain standard pricing.
Rule35: Under the condition that the bank differentiates its service offering, the bank enhances customer value.
Rule36: Either the bank follows industry trends or, if the bank enhances customer value, then the bank competes with other banks.
Rule37: Provided that the bank closes underperforming branches, the bank transitions to digital-only.
Rule38: Either the bank closes underperforming branches or the bank retains all branches.
Rule39: Under the condition that the bank identifies cost savings, if the bank retains all branches, then the bank operates physical branches.
Rule40: If the bank optimizes resource allocation, then the bank identifies cost savings.
Rule41: Provided that the bank performs a credit check, if the bank complies with privacy regulations, then the bank requires data protection.
Rule42: Under the condition that the bank uses data analytics, if the bank analyzes branch performance, then the bank optimizes resource allocation.
Rule43: Either the bank uses data analytics or the bank relies on manual reports.
Rule44: Whenever the bank relies on manual reports, if the bank analyzes branch performance, then the bank optimizes resource allocation.

Rule45: Provided that the bank adopts cloud technology, if it is not the case that under the condition that the bank reduces its branch network, the bank implements a hybrid model, then the bank achieves cost reduction.

Rule46: Under the condition that the bank upgrades legacy systems, if it is not the case that whenever the bank reduces its branch network, the bank implements a hybrid model, then the bank achieves cost reduction.
Rule47: If the bank commits to digital transformation, then the bank adopts cloud technology.
Rule48: Either the bank commits to digital transformation or the bank continues with a traditional approach.
Rule49: Under the condition that the bank gains a market advantage, the bank loses its competitive edge.
Rule50: Whenever the bank manages a loan portfolio, either the bank conducts risk assessment or the bank performs a credit check.
Rule51: Either the bank targets small businesses or the bank serves retail customers.
Rule52: If it is not the case that either the bank achieves its profitability target or the bank meets regulatory requirements, then the bank misses its revenue target.
Rule53: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the bank achieves its profitability target or the bank meets regulatory requirements, the bank exceeds its expense budget.
Rule54: Whenever it is not the case that if the bank reduces its branch network, then the bank implements a hybrid model, the bank does not achieve cost reduction.
Rule55: Provided that it is not the case that provided that the bank launches a new product line, the bank captures a market opportunity, the bank differentiates its service offering.
Rule56: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever the bank continues with a traditional approach, the bank upgrades legacy systems, the bank gains a market advantage.
Rule57: Whenever it is not the case that provided that the bank targets small businesses, the bank provides business loans, the bank does not need collateral.

Rule58: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever the bank targets small businesses, the bank provides business loans, then the bank secures asset backing, the bank faces default risk.

Rule59: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that the bank meets regulatory requirements, then the bank does not experience a cyber attack, then the bank prevents a security incident, the bank pays a regulatory fine.

Rule60: If it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that the bank meets regulatory requirements, the bank does not experience a cyber attack, then the bank prevents a security incident, then the bank does not pay a regulatory fine.

Rule61: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the bank meets regulatory requirements, then the bank does not experience a cyber attack, the bank suffers a data breach.
Rule62: Whenever it is not the case that the bank meets regulatory requirements, the bank experiences a cyber attack.
facts: Fact1: The bank uses a credit scoring system.
Fact2: The bank allocates an R&D budget.
Fact3: The bank complies with privacy regulations.
Fact4: The bank receives regulatory approval.
Fact5: The bank launches a new product line.
Fact6: The bank analyzes branch performance.
Fact7: The bank manages a loan portfolio.
Fact8: It is not the case that the bank faces default risk.
Fact9: The bank does not achieve its profitability target.
Fact10: It is not the case that the bank transitions to digital-only.
Fact11: The bank does not face regulatory hurdles.
Fact12: It is not the case that the bank improves operational efficiency.
Fact13: The bank does not compete with other banks.
Fact14: It is not the case that the bank follows industry trends.
Fact15: The bank does not lose its competitive edge.
Fact16: It is not the case that the bank offers a mortgage product.
